short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KyudaGPT is an AI assistant that helps you with your daily tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KyudaGPT is a Chrome extension designed to revolutionize your browsing and content creation experience by integrating powerful AI models directly into your sidebar. Whether you're reading articles, writing documents, or seeking creative inspiration, KyudaGPT offers real-time assistance with features like summarization, translation, AI chatbots, and text-to-image art generation, all while you navigate across any website. Simplify your digital life with KyudaGPT, your go-to AI assistant for smarter, faster, and more engaging online interactions.
